content: sts before the corner in the corner chain space insert 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 6 back - double_crochet twins in a stitch chain 3 and turn * insert 1 double_crochet in the chain space insert 2 double_crochet in between the twins from the previous round until the corner chain space in the corner chain space insert 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 7 front - block stitch chain 3 and turn insert 3 double_crochet in corner chain space * skip over 2 sets of twins and insert block stitch in the space continue placing a block stitch in every other space until you reach the corner in the corner chain space insert 4 double_crochet chain 2 4 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner space insert 4 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round repeat rounds 2-7 until the desired size is achieved image c2 opyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for video tutorial available on youtube personal use only it may not be reproduced distributed @juantheyarnaddict or sold without the express written permission of the designer finished items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer please like/share/subscribe social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends
